divs: Sighting DetailsI live approxamatley 7 miles west of Cape Caneveral AFS. I watch all of the satelittle and shuttle launches from my front yard. Last night, Mar 6 2009, I was watching the launch of the Kepler Telescope. While looking at the launch vehicle, I noticed a triangle shape of lights, flickering on and off, on the left side, north of the rocket. I had forgotten my camera, so I went inside and returned with it. When I pointed my video camera at this object, my camera did not focus, it showed a warning light to take the lens cap off, it was hanging down on it's string. I could not get any pictures or video. This object was in this position for approx 20 mins. Then I became concerned and went inside. Have you had any other reports from this area? Teresa Glass, 321-617-7612
Summary: Sighting of triangle shaped UFO during launch of Kepler telescope.
trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Cape Canaveral
There were no other sightings in Cape Canaveral on or around March 6th 2009
This sighting has never been favorited.
